musicList.title: Walk
musicList.lyrics:
Verse 1:
走在熙熙攘攘的街道
感受着城市的喧嚣

Chorus:
一步一步向前走
追寻着心中的梦

Verse 2:
不管前方有多远
我都会勇敢前行

musicList.title: Song Two
musicList.lyrics:
Verse 1:
This is the first verse
Singing about life and love

Chorus:
This is the chorus
Repeat after me

Verse 2:
This is the second verse
Telling stories through music
